Rulings.Edison:
●You can only use Roulette Barrel's effect once per turn.
●You have to roll a die twice, not once. You must roll the die twice in a row, not once in Main Phase 1 and once in Main Phase 2, etc.
●You CAN select a die roll result which doesn't match the Level Stars of a face-up monster. But if the die roll you select does match a monster, you MUST destroy a face-up monster with the correct number of Level Stars.
●Roulette Barrel can destroy itself with its effect.
●You can't destroy a monster with 7 or more stars with Roulette Barrel's effect.
Rulings.Tengu:
●You can only use Roulette Barrel's effect once per turn.
●You have to roll a die twice, not once. You must roll the die twice in a row, not once in Main Phase 1 and once in Main Phase 2, etc.
●You CAN select a die roll result which doesn't match the Level Stars of a face-up monster. But if the die roll you select does match a monster, you MUST destroy a face-up monster with the correct number of Level Stars.
●Roulette Barrel can destroy itself with its effect.

Rulings.Goat:
●You can only use Roulette Barrel's effect once per turn.
●You have to roll a die twice, not once. You must roll the die twice in a row, not once in MP 1 and once in MP 2, etc.
●You CAN select a die roll result which doesn't match the Lv Stars of a face-up monster. But if the die roll you select does match a monster, you MUST destroy a face-up monster with the correct number of Lv Stars.
●Roulette Barrel can destroy itself with its effect.
●You cannot destroy a monster with 7 or more stars with Roulette Barrel's effect.
●Q: With “Roulette Barrel”, does “Dice Re-Roll” allow you to redo both dice rolls or only one of them? 
A: You would perform both dice rolls again. You do not select just 1 of them to re-roll.

Rulings.Base:
1. You can only use the effect of "Roulette Barrel" once per turn.
2. You have to roll a die twice, not once. You must roll the die twice in a row, not once in Main Phase 1 and once in Main Phase 2, etc.
3. You CAN select a die roll result which doesn't match the Level Stars of a face-up monster. But if the die roll you select does match a monster, you MUST destroy a face-up monster with the correct number of Level Stars.
4. "Roulette Barrel" can destroy itself with its effect.
5. You cannot destroy a monster with 7 or more stars with the effect of "Roulette Barrel".

PSCT.Base: Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die twice, choose 1 result, and destroy 1 monster on the field whose Level is equal to that result.
